edge: The film score of Kahaani is composed by Clinton Cerejo.
The soundtrack album of Kahaani, consisting of six songs, is composed by Vishal–Shekhar.
Several compositions by R. D. Burman, both in Hindi and Bengali, are used in the background score of Kahaani.
The lyrics for some of the songs in the Kahaani soundtrack are written by Vishal Dadlani.
The lyrics for some of the songs in the Kahaani soundtrack are written by Anvita Dutt.
The lyrics for some of the songs in the Kahaani soundtrack are written by Sandeep Srivastava.
The Kahaani soundtrack was released on Apple iTunes India, a digital music platform, since its inception from mid-2012.
